sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID_MAIN_IMAGE,SORT_NO,RECODE_ST,TITLE,URL,Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY SORT_NO, RECODE_ST, REG_DT DESC) AS "ROWNUM" FROM T_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE MAIN_TYP=#main_typ# AND LANG_TYP = 'KR'
AND RECODE_ST = #sel_recode#
ORDER BY SORT_NO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_MAIN_IMAGE SET SORT_NO = TO_NUMBER(#sort_no#) where MAIN_TYP=#main_typ# AND ID_MAIN_IMAGE = #img_id#
